subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Liverpool reclaimed the top spot in the Premier League after defeating West Ham, 2-1, on Sunday to remain firmly in the hunt for the club’s first league title since 1990.
snippet: Liverpool reclaimed the top spot in the Premier League after defeating West Ham, 2-1, on Sunday to remain firmly in the hunt for the club’s first league title since 1990.
